intro: Staurogyne kaengkrachanensis, commonly known as the Kaeng Krachan staurogyne, is a species of flowering plant native to Thailand. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its compact growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically features opposite leaves with serrated edges and produces small, clustered inflorescences. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
